abstract.t: The memo lists operational requirements for IPv6 SMTP, and IPv6-capableMX DNS records. As we deploy IPv6 SMTP servers, it became apparent thatwe need certain configuration in IPv6-capable MX DNS record, for stabledual-stack (IPv4 and IPv6) SMTP operations. The document tries toclarify the problems we have in transition period between IPv4 SMTP andIPv6 SMTP, and operational requirements for stable IPv4/v6 SMTPoperation.
